峨山彝族自治縣.pinyin: E2 shan1 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
峨山彝族自治縣.definition: Eshan Yizu Autonomous County in Yuxi 玉溪市[Yu4xi1 Shi4], Yunnan

峨山縣.definition: Eshan Yizu autonomous county in Yuxi 玉溪[Yu4 xi1], Yunnan

峨嵋鶲鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Martens's warbler (Phylloscopus omeiensis)

峨眉.definition: (used in place names, notably 峨眉山[E2mei2 Shan1] Mount Emei in Sichuan)

峨眉山.definition: Mount Emei in Sichuan, one of the four sacred mountains of Chinese Buddhism

峨眉山市.definition: Emeishan, county-level city in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

峨眉柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Emei leaf warbler (Phylloscopus emeiensis)

峨眉鄉.definition: Emei township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan

峨邊彝族自治縣.pinyin: E2 bian1 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
峨邊彝族自治縣.definition: Ebian Yizu Autonomous County in Leshan 樂山市|乐山市[Le4shan1 Shi4], Sichuan

峨邊縣.definition: Ebian Yizu autonomous county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan
